snippet: Minnesota’s Carl Pavano settled down after a shaky first inning and beat his former teammates in his first start at Yankee Stadium since 2009.
abstract: Minnesota Twins defeat New York Yankees, 7-3.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota’s Carl Pavano settled down after a shaky first inning and beat his former teammates in his first start at Yankee Stadium since 2009.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Strong Start Ruined by Pavano’s Finish
headline.main: Yankees Knock Around Pavano Early, but the Twins Get to Garcia Often
headline.print_headline: Yankees Knock Around Pavano Early, but the Twins Get to Garcia Often
